realEstateId.description: The identifier of the real estate, usually assigned by the seller and unique within a website, similar to product SKU.

name.description: The name of the real estate.

datePublished.description: Publication date of the real estate offer.

description.description: The description of the real estate.

numberOfBathroomsTotal.description: The total number of bathrooms in the real estate.

numberOfFullBathrooms.description: The number of full bathrooms in the real estate.

numberOfPartialBathrooms.description: The number of half bathrooms in the real estate.

numberOfBedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms in the real estate.

numberOfRooms.description: The number of rooms (excluding bathrooms and closets) of the real estate.

tradeType.description: Type of a trade action: buying or renting. Takes one of the values: RentAction, BuyAction.

price.description: The offer price of the real estate.

currency.description: The currency associated with the price, in ISO 4217 standard (e.g. USD).

propertyType.description: Type of the property, e.g. flat, house, land.

yearBuilt.description: The year the real estate was constructed in.

dateDownloaded.description:
The timestamp at which the product data was downloaded.
Timezone: UTC.
